alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 09 at 6:56PM EDT until July 09 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHEASTERN LAWRENCE COUNTY... At 656 PM EDT, local law enforcement reported heavy rain producing flooding in McKee Run and surrounding creeks and streams. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. Several roads remain closed in the inundated area. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Ellwood City, New Beaver, Wampum, Rose Point Park and McConnells Mill. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
